Asura, Hashirama and Naruto team up together, with Naruto in Tailed Beast Mode forming a Rasenshuriken in the center of Asura's Amenomihashira, formed by both the wooden statues created by the latter and Hashirama, following Naruto throwing the large combined Rasenshuriken at the opponent.
